official_title: A resolution authorizing Representative McDade of Pennsylvania to respond to a subpoena in the case of Boston Pneumatics, Inc. against Ingersoll-Rand Company pending in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Authorizes Representative McDade of Pennsylvania to respond to a subpoena in the case of Boston Pneumatics, Inc. against Ingersoll-Rand Company pending in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing Representative McDade of Pennsylvania to respond to a subpoena in the case of Boston Pneumatics, Inc. against Ingersoll-Rand Company pending in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania.
